channel.title: cbc on GIICIS
channel.description: Recent content in cbc on GIICIS

item.title: Release planning problem
item.author: leohoet98@gmail.com (Leonardo Hoet)
item.description: A more powerful model than the next release problem which can provide an schedule of how a project need to plan its releases.

item.title: Next release problem
item.author: leohoet98@gmail.com (Leonardo Hoet)
item.description: A common problem in every software project is which requirement should the team implement in order to satisfy stakeholders' needs. In this blog, we aim to define a formal model that can help us with this problem.
